## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/tileinfo">TileInfo</a></>}>
A helper struct to create IR loop nests for tiling in IR of the following form: for ColumnLoop.Index = 0..NumColumns for RowLoop.Index = 0..NumRows for KLoop.Index = 0..NumInner. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/tileinfo/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/tileinfo/matrixloop">MatrixLoop</a></>}>
Properties of a single loop used when generating the tiled loop nest. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/tileinfo/matrixloop/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>
